com.google.code.jscep.pkcs7
Class PkcsPkiEnvelopeParser

java.lang.Object
  com.google.code.jscep.pkcs7.PkcsPkiEnvelopeParser

public class PkcsPkiEnvelopeParser
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used for parsing SCEP pkcsPKIEnvelope structures.

The pkcsPKIEnvelope is a EnvelopedData with a messageData content. This class will decrypt the provided ContentInfo.

Author:
David Grant
